verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God has His best things for the few who dare to stand the test. He has His other things for those who will not have His best.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The good is the enemy of the best Without His best there is no rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And others make the highest choice, But when by trials pressed, They shrink, they yield, They shun the Cross, And so they lose His best.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The good is the enemy of the best Without His best there is no rest{/lang-eng}
